skill.s1.name: Melodic Blaze
skill.s1.description: Deals [color=#ff381d][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#ff381d][b]Fire DMG[/b][/color] to 1 enemy 3 times, gains 2 stacks of [color=#b4c5e0][b][Moon Phase][/b][/color] for 2 turns, up to 4 stacks.

When Makoto Yuki consumes [color=#b4c5e0][b][Moon Phase][/b][/color] to deal DMG with [ref=s2][color=#8bb2f1][b][u][Scarlet-Devouring Blaze][/u][/b][/color][/ref], increases the skill multiplier by [color=#ff381d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
skill.s2.name: Moonlit Hymn
skill.s2.description: Increases all allies [color=#ff381d][b]CRIT DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#ff381d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] and own [color=#ff381d][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#ff381d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
Gains 2 stacks of [color=#b4c5e0][b][Moon Phase][/b][/color] for 2 turns, up to 4 stacks.
skill.s3.name: Scarlet-Devouring Blaze
skill.s3.description: [b]Use Condition:[/b] When Makoto has at least 2 stacks of [color=#b4c5e0][b][Moon Phase][/b][/color].

Consumes all [color=#b4c5e0][b][Moon Phase][/b][/color], for each stack of [color=#b4c5e0][b][Moon Phase][/b][/color] consumed, deals 1 hit of [color=#ff381d][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#ff381d][b]Fire DMG[/b][/color] to 1 enemy.

Afterwards, consumes all  [color=#2dd304][b][Special Moon Phase][/b][/color], for each stack of [color=#2dd304][b][Special Moon Phase][/b][/color] consumed, additionally deals 1 hit of [color=#ff381d][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] as [color=#ff381d][b]Fire DMG[/b][/color] to 1 enemy.

If Makoto has 4 stacks of [color=#b4c5e0][b][Moon Phase][/b][/color], increases own [color=#ff381d][b]PEN[/b][/color] by [color=#ff381d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] and [color=#ff381d][b]DMG Dealt[/b][/color] by [color=#ff381d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] when using this skill.
skill.t1.name: Theurgy - Ardhanari
skill.t1.description: Deals [color=#ff381d][b]{skill_data} ATK[/b][/color] [color=#ff381d][b]Fire DMG[/b][/color] to 1 enemy 4 times.
Gains 1 stack of [color=#2dd304][b][Special Moon Phase][/b][/color] for 2 turns, up to 4 stacks.
skill.t2.name: Theurgy - Cadenza
skill.t2.description: Increases all allies [color=#ff381d][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#ff381d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] and DMG Dealt by [color=#ff381d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
Gains 1 stack of [color=#2dd304][b][Special Moon Phase][/b][/color] for 2 turns, up to 4 stacks.
skill.assist.name: Assist Skill
skill.assist.description: Increase an ally's [color=#ff381d][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#ff381d][b]20%[/b][/color] for 1 turn.
skill.p1.name: Leader
skill.p1.description: After using [color=#57b9ea][b][Theurgy][/b][/color], increase all allies' [color=#ff381d][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#ff381d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color], additionally increases SEES allies' ATK by [color=#ff381d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 2 turns.
skill.p2.name: Trust
skill.p2.description: When Makoto Yuki receives buffs/healing/shield from allies, increases own [color=#ff381d][b]CRIT DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#ff381d][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] for 2 turns, up to [color=#ff381d][b]21.6%[/b][/color].
awareness.a0.name: Great Guide
awareness.a0.description: Makoto Yuki has two Theurgies: [ref=t1][color=#57b9ea][b][u][Cadenza][/u][/b][/color][/ref] and [ref=t1][color=#57b9ea][b][u][Ardhanari][/u][/b][/color][/ref].
At the start of battle, restores 35 Theurgy Energy if own Theurgy Energy is less than 35.
When Makoto Yuki receives buffs/healing/shield from allies, gains 1 stack of [color=#b4c5e0][b][Moon Phase][/b][/color] for 2 turns, up to 4 stacks.

He can only gain 1 stack of [color=#b4c5e0][b][Moon Phase][/b][/color] per turn from this effect. Increases [color=#ff381d][b]PEN[/b][/color] by [color=#ff381d][b]4%/8%/12%[/b][/color] [b](Change when reaching level 1, 50, 70)[/b] when Makoto Yuki has [color=#b4c5e0][b][Moon Phase][/b][/color].
awareness.a1.name: Greet My Dawn Star
awareness.a1.description: When using [ref=s1][color=#8bb2f1][b][u][Melodic Blaze][/u][/b][/color][/ref], additionally deals 1 hit of [color=#ff381d][b]DMG[/b][/color].

When using [ref=s2][color=#8bb2f1][b][u][ref=s2][color=#8bb2f1][b][u][Moonlit Hymn][/u][/b][/color][/ref][/u][/b][/color][/ref], additionally increases all allies' [color=#ff381d][b]PEN[/b][/color] by [color=#ff381d][b]10%[/b][/color] for 2 turns.

When using [ref=s2][color=#8bb2f1][b][u][Scarlet-Devouring Blaze][/u][/b][/color][/ref], if has have 4 stacks of [color=#b4c5e0][b][Moon Phase][/b][/color], additionally increases own [color=#ff381d][b]CRIT Rate[/b][/color] by [color=#ff381d][b]16%[/b][/color].
awareness.a2.name: Unwavering Heart
awareness.a2.description: At the start of Makoto Yuki's turn, if Makoto reached 4 stacks of [color=#b4c5e0][b][Moon Phase][/b][/color], automatically uses Moonlit Hymn.
This effect has a 1 turn cooldown.
awareness.a3.name: Under The Full Moon
awareness.a3.description: [ref=s2][color=#8bb2f1][b][u][Scarlet-Devouring Blaze][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Lv. +3, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
[ref=t1][color=#57b9ea][b][u][Cadenza][/u][/b][/color][/ref] & [ref=t1][color=#57b9ea][b][u][Ardhanari][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Lv. +3, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
awareness.a4.name: Thorny Path
awareness.a4.description: When using [ref=t1][color=#57b9ea][b][u][Cadenza][/u][/b][/color][/ref], additionally increases all allies' [color=#ff381d][b]DMG Dealt[/b][/color] by [color=#ff381d][b]10%[/b][/color].
When using [ref=t1][color=#57b9ea][b][u][Ardhanari][/u][/b][/color][/ref], additionally deals 1 hit of damage.
awareness.a5.name: Blazing Soul
awareness.a5.description: [ref=s1][color=#8bb2f1][b][u][Melodic Blaze][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Lv. +3, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
[ref=s2][color=#8bb2f1][b][u][Moonlit Hymn][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Lv. +3, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
awareness.a6.name: The Promise
awareness.a6.description: When Makoto Yuki uses any [color=#57b9ea][b][Theurgy][/b][/color], automatically triggers the other [color=#57b9ea][b][Theurgy][/b][/color].

When Makoto Yuki consumes  [color=#2dd304][b][Special Moon Phase][/b][/color] to deal [color=#ff381d][b]DMG[/b][/color] with [ref=s2][color=#8bb2f1][b][u][Scarlet-Devouring Blaze][/u][/b][/color][/ref], increases the skill damage by [color=#ff381d][b]20%[/b][/color].
When Makoto Yuki first receives fatal [color=#ff381d][b]DMG[/b][/color], his [color=#ff381d][b]HP[/b][/color] cannot drop below 1 until the end of his next turn.
He then enters near death, he will faint when his next turn ends.
Removes near death if his [color=#ff381d][b]HP[/b][/color] is restored above [color=#ff381d][b]25%[/b][/color] [color=#ff381d][b]Max HP[/b][/color] during near death.
awareness.a7.name: Awakened Beyond Awareness
awareness.a7.description: At the beginning of each turn, restore an additional 15 Theurgy Energy.
When a skill hits more than 3 times, increase [color=#ff381d][b]Final DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#ff381d][b]30%[/b][/color].
